resources.string: So bye bye for now. See you soon.Be safe
My Name is Aryan Bisht I am from Dehradun, Uttarakhand (I know you guys already know :-) ). I want to say that I am really exicted to work with you guys.
This app is made for just showing my skills I have little time to made this so I have made this app very simple without any fancy animations and special layout I am showing my back-end skills.
I also know how to upload and save images but due to time constraint I am not able to do this
Tap on the user which you want to delete
